docs.title: Home
docs.text: My name is Claire, and I've worked in journalism and social science research, and I am now self-studying data science. You can find me on linked-in here.

docs.title: Analysis of Data Job Market Trends Using Python
docs.text: I'm currently using the following dataset from data analyst and content creator Luke Barousse to analyze job market trends for data professionals. For now, I have only uploaded my first steps, but I will upload the full code once I have finished debugging the projet.

docs.title: 1. Importing libraries.
docs.text:
# Importing Libraries
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

docs.title: 2. Loading Data.
docs.text:
from datasets import load_dataset
dataset = load_dataset('lukebarousse/data_jobs')
df = dataset['train'].to_pandas()
